Package controller

Class DrawAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.DrawAssistant
  • public class DrawAssistant
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to separate the drawing logic and calculations.

      • DrawAssistant

        public DrawAssistant​(ResizeListener resizeListener,
                     java.util.List<CustomPoint> dataPoints,
                     ScaleManager scales)
        Constructor for initialization of the DrawAssistant.
        Parameters:
        resizeListener - object to call if the DiagramPane needs to be resized.
        dataPoints - list where points are stored
        scales - object which holds scale information

    • Method Detail

      • setDataPoints

        public void setDataPoints​(java.util.List<CustomPoint> dataPoints)
        Sets the points to draw. Checks if the DiagramPane needs to be resized according to the values in the dataPoints list.
        Parameters:
        dataPoints - list, which holds point data.
